about_the_game:
You awake inside of a cave in Starnex Island with your handgun, pump shotgun, and rifle ready to shoot anything that gets in your way of escaping the island of Starnex.
The island of Starnex is under attack by an unknown force. This force has released four monsters into the world of Starnex. It has brought it's own army to stop anyone that stands in its way. Defeat all four monsters to unlock the tunnel of death and escape the island.

Explore!
-Search for missing persons and help them with their quests

Gear up!
-Find supplies and gold to unlock new weaponry.

Collect!
-Collect trinkets, medallions, bullets, and upgrades.

Power up!
-Grab boost power ups to become even more powerful.

Destroy your enemies!
-Destroy zombies, ghosts, gangster chickens, tacos, and much more!

content_descriptors.notes: There is constant depiction of shooting, killing, and beheading of cartoonish figures. Heads explode into blood spraying upward. Blood spatters across the screen when near blood fountains and dead enemies.
